name: Mike is ill
description:
Mike is ill is a simple game inspired by games from early 2000-s like half life, about solving puzzles in attempt to get all items necessary to help your brother

Gameplay

This  is a very simple top down view game with puzzles

Controls

WASD to move, E to interact, ESC to pause

Story

Your little brother is feeling ill after fight with iron horse, and you decide to to help him feel better. So you need to collect all of the necessary items to perform the ritual in this nightmare like world

Developed for  My First Game Jam: Summer 2022
